claims.object: Converting rotary motion to linear motion

surface_layer.definition: A mechanism that converts rotary motion into linear motion by using a rotating crank and a connecting rod.

deep_layer.mechanism: The rotating crank causes the connecting rod to move linearly, converting rotary motion into linear motion.
deep_layer.origin: Mechanical design for converting between rotary and linear motion.
